articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman's Statement Distributed as UN Document
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman's Statement Distributed as UN Document
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry over the UN Security Council "sanctions resolution" 2397, which was cooked up by the U.S. denouncing the DPRK's successful test launch of ICBM Hwasong-15, was distributed as an official document A/72/690-S/2017/1106 of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council on Jan. 9.

articles.title: Over 150 Poems Created in DPRK
articles.content:
Over 150 Poems Created in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Poets throughout the country have created more than 150 poems after hearing with great excitement the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Those poems include "We Have Adopted the Decision of the Party Cell" and "The People of the Powerful Country, Forward!"
					
					 Poets of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea created dozens of poems with strong appeal reflecting the spirit of the times at the construction and production sites.
					
					 Poets of the South and North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Union visited the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine, the Sinuiju Textile Mill and other production units to post up their short poems at the working sites encouraging the workers to a great upsurge in production.
					
					 Some poets called at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Chollima Steel Complex, the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the Chongsan Co-op Farm and other industrial establishments and farms to produce militant and optimistic poems.

articles.title: Medical Service in DPRK
articles.content:
Medical Service in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Medical workers of the DPRK have actively conducted the field medical service in hearty response to the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Medical workers of the Pyongyang Medical College Hospital of 
					
					Kim Il Sung University and Kim Man Yu Hospital set up treatment posts at the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex and the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant to carry on preventive and curative care for their employees, thus encouraging them to make big innovations in electricity production. 
					
					 Medical workers of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital dispatched to the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill have exerted themselves for medical check-up and medical service for women workers.
					
					 Meanwhile, medical workers of the Ryugyong Dental Hospital and Pyongyang Municipal People's Hospitals Nos. 2 and 3 have taken care of the health of workers and technicians in a responsible manner at major industrial establishments of the country. 
					
					 The brisk field medical service shows well the advantages of the people-oriented policy of public health.

articles.title: Atmosphere of National Reconciliation, Unity and Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Atmosphere of National Reconciliation, Unity and Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The new proposal for improved north-south relations set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address commands full support and response of all Koreans, and its validity and vitality are being proved clearly as the days go by.
					 The present atmosphere for improving the inter-Korean relations created thanks to our pro-active proposal and efforts is a revelation of our sincere will to make a breakthrough in improving the north-south relations and achieving independent reunification of the country regardless of the past as befitting the status of the Korean nation as the world nuclear power.
					
					 Priceless is the atmosphere of national reconciliation, unity and reunification prevailing on the Korean Peninsula which had been in danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 It is very urgent to keep the atmosphere of national reconciliation mounting at present.
					
					 To respect and trust each other is the starting point and precondition for reconciliation and unity between the north and the south.
					
					 National reunification is the long-cherished desire of the nation and all Koreans should not have different intention for the great cause of reunification.
					
					 Differences in ideology and system of the north and the south cannot be a reason for distrust and confrontation among the fellow countrymen and isms and interests of classes and social strata cannot be hurdles for national unity.
					
					 The door of dialogue, contacts and visits is opened to everyone who is sincerely hoping for national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 When the north and the south promote bilateral contact, travel, cooperation and exchange on a broad scale in the spirit of companion and driving force of reunification, better and more favorable conditions and circumstances will be provided.
					
					 Recalling the past history, whenever good atmosphere prevailed between the north and the south, anti-reunification forces at home and abroad made more desperate efforts to divide and sow discord among Koreans.
					
					 Unless we put an end to the acts that might offend the other party and incite discord and hostility, the hard-won precious opportunity will be missed and the clock for reunification will turn back.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad, irrespective of their residence, should pool their patriotic minds for national reunification and further promote national reconciliation and unity as members of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Will for National Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Will for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is the loadstar of national reunification and the father of the nation who put forward the most just and fair proposals and wisely leads all Koreans to the sacred struggle for national reunification true to instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification.
					 It is Kim Jong Un's steadfast determination and will to reject any interference of outsiders and reunify the country by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation itself.
					
					 He inspected Panmunjom in March Juche 101 (2012).
					
					 First of all, he went round the monument inscribed with Kim Il Sung's signature in Panmunjom.
					
					 Looking at the letters of the monument carefully, he recollected with deep emotion the undying feats of Kim Il Sung who worked heart and soul to reunify the country all his life. It was a manifestation of his firm faith to carry out the peerlessly great men's instructions for national reunification without fail. 
					
					 He in his speech delivered at the military parade for celebrating the centenary of Kim Il Sung's birth solemnly clarified the principled stand at home and abroad that the DPRK would join hands with anyone who truly wants the reunification of the country and the peace and prosperity of the nation and make responsible and persistent efforts for carrying out the historic cause of national reunification. 
					
					 In the Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee, he said that the north and the south should respect each other and take hands as partners of national reunification to open a new phase in improving inter-Korean relations and reunifying the country.
					
					 His steadfast will for national reunification and idea of great unity encourage all the Koreans at home and abroad in their struggle to bring earlier the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Demonstrating DPRK's Dignity and Might
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Demonstrating DPRK's Dignity and Might
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday editorially appeals to all the people to launch a revolutionary general offensive under the leadership of the great Party so as to fully demonstrate the dignity of Juche Korea and its spirit of rapid progress.
					 The all-people general offensive - this is the one based on single-hearted unity that can be seen in the DPRK only where the great Party and the people share the destiny and future to the last, says the editorial.
					
					 All the people should adorn every day of the offensive with fresh struggle and feats in hearty response to the ardent calls of the Party, it says, and goes on:
					
					 The whole Party, the entire army and all the people should turn out as one in the campaign to carry through the militant tasks set forth in the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un with high awareness and passion.
					
					 We should channel all our energies into implementing the tasks with his New Year Address as a banner and signpost for the victory of the revolutionary general offensive and glorify the indomitable heroic era with the might of great harmonious whole.
					
					 All sectors and units have to certainly attain the goals set by the Party this year despite the tenser situation and the worst adversity.
					
					 We should make rapid progress in the building of a powerful socialist country by taking the historic victory in the building of the state nuclear force as a springboard for fresh progress.

articles.title: Independence is Justice and Victory: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Independence is Justice and Victory: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The imperialists are making desperate efforts to stem the violent trend of the world people advancing along the road of independence, but no force on the earth can check the onward movement of the world people advancing independently with their destiny in their own hands, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Independence is justice and victory and victory is sure to come when struggling with firm faith on the basis of the correct methodology.
					
					 Independence should be maintained in politics, self-support achieved in the economy and self-reliance in national defence enhanced.
					
					 The countries aspiring after independence should unite and struggle for international justice.
					
					 An independent new world can be built when unity is achieved.
					
					 The imperialists fear most the world people following the road of independence in close unity and solidarity.
					
					 When the broad people in the world struggle, united close under the uplifted banner of independence and justice, they can foil any aggression moves of the imperialists and their strategy of strength and realize the global independence.
					
					 Nothing can check the current of development of history toward independence.
					
					 The world progressive people should vigorously wage the struggle against imperialism and hegemony, with the faith that independence is justice and victory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Chilling Atmosphere of Mending North-South Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Chilling Atmosphere of Mending North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. military announced that it planned to deploy the nuclear carrier Stennis in the West Pacific soon in the wake of making public the deployments of Ronald Reagan staying in Japan and Carl Vinson in the U.S. mainland in the waters off the Korean Peninsula.
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. reinforced various type fighters and troops in its air bases in south Korea and Japan from its mainland.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says that such moves are an unpardonable military provocation chilling the atmosphere for improved inter-Korean relations created by the DPRK's pro-active proposal and efforts and challenging the unanimous desire and demand of the public at home and abroad for detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The commentary says that the U.S. reckless military provocations are reminiscent of a pack of wolves eyeing a feast at other's wedding house.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. aggressor forces deployed in and around the Korean Peninsula would become the best prey of the Hwasong artillerymen that put Guam and the U.S. mainland in their striking range.
					
					 The U.S. had better awake from an illusion, properly facing up to the strategic position and entity of the DPRK as a world-level military power.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers would be well advised to ponder over disastrous consequences to be entailed by their military provocations against the DPRK possessed of powerful nuclear deterrence, cool down their heads heated with war hysteria and stop acting rashly.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on New Policy for Improved North-South Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on New Policy for Improved North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article says that the new policy for improving the relations between the north and the south, clarified by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address, is a brilliant embodiment of the Juche-based line for national reunification which the DPRK has consistently maintained and a revelation of his noble patriotic will to write a new history of national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation itself.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 It is the most positive policy for reunification as it correctly reflects the immensely increased comprehensive national strength of the DPRK, strategic structure on the Korean Peninsula dramatically changed by it, the prevailing situation and the ever-growing desire for reunification.
					
					 The issue of easing the acute military tension between the north and the south and creating a peaceful environment on the Korean Peninsula, the issue of positively establishing a climate favorable for national reconciliation and reunification and the issue for the authorities in the north and the south to hold aloft the banner of national independence serve as a precious guideline that should be held fast to in defusing the tensions and improving the inter-Korean relations at present.
					
					 The recent north-south high-level talks, held under this new policy, proved again that there is no problem unsolvable if the north and the south pool their efforts.
					
					 Now is the time for the north and the south to have sincere discussion on the issue of improving their relations and seek a way out for the nation in a bold manner by the concerted efforts.
					
					 The issue of improving inter-Korean relations is an important matter to be solved by the concerted efforts of not only the authorities but also the entire nation.
					
					 We will open the door of dialogue, contact and travel to anyone in south Korea, including the ruling party and opposition parties, organizations and individual personages of all backgrounds, if they truly want national reconciliation and unity.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on U.S. Moves Mischievous to Koreans' Happy Event
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on U.S. Moves Mischievous to Koreans' Happy Event
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is showing the sign of moving its sea and air forces massively to and around the Korean peninsula.
					 After announcing on the deployment of Japan-based nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan and U.S. mainland-based nuclear carrier Carl Vinson in waters off the Korean peninsula on Jan. 5, the U.S. is trumpeting about dispatch of nuclear carrier Stennis into the west Pacific waters.
					
					 It has also let three landing copter flotilla--WASP, Bonhome Richard and America capable of landing one division-strong U.S. marines in areas of the DPRK in case of emergency--change its preset courses and sail toward the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is reported that seven U.S. air force bases in south Korea and Japan now house a great number of fighters and troops with various missions that came from the U.S. mainland, facing a "glut".
					
					 This mischievous behavior is aimed to chill the hard-won atmosphere for improving the ties between the north and the south of Korea and ruin the nation's great event, and it constitutes an intolerable challenge to the unanimous desire and wish of the public at home and abroad for detente and peace on the peninsula.
					
					 Whenever the north and south made dialogues and contacts and there showed the sign of improving the ties, the U.S. worked with bloodshot eyes to check it.
					
					 When the historic July 4 joint statement was made public to raise the enthusiasm for reunification all across the 3,000-ri land of Korea, the U.S. instigated the south Korean authorities to cook up "two Koreas" and when the north-south ties made significant progress following the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the U.S. also obstructed it, being displeased with it.
					
					 The U.S. nature of standing against reunification remains unchanged.
					
					 This time, it outwardly voiced "support" for the north-south dialogues but in fact, it introduced huge aggression troops to and around the Korean Peninsula in its design to prevent the north-south ties from making improvement.
					
					 The south Korean media and experts comment that, when taking the sailing speed of Carl Vinson into account, it is estimated to enter the waters off the Korean Peninsula toward the end of January or early in February just before the opening of Phyongchang Olympics, adding that it is extremely unusual to see three nuclear carrier task forces amassed in waters off the peninsula at a time, with Ronald Reagan already deployed in Japan.
					
					 All these moves of the U.S. remind one of a wolf scrolling outside a banqueting house, and they become a good target for Hwasong artillerymen of the DPRK who have put Guam and even the U.S. mainland in their striking range.
					
					 All the Koreans should clearly see through the sinister intention and the aggression nature of the U.S. and staunchly fight against the reckless arms buildup moves of the U.S. and its attempt at a war against the north.

articles.title: Repeal of Humiliating "Agreement" with Japan Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of Humiliating "Agreement" with Japan Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea reportedly held a press conference outside the Foreign Ministry on Jan. 10 to urge the repeal of humiliating "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The speakers stressed that the issue can be settled only when the Japanese government admits its crimes and make apology and reparation for them.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the authorities gave up renegotiation with Japan on the "agreement", the speakers said, condemning such action as mockery to the victims and other people.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Denounce Authorities
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Denounce Authorities
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps, the Foundation for Preserving Justice for the Settlement of the Issue of the Sexual Slavery and the Study Society on Comfort Women for the Imperial Japanese Army in south Korea released a joint statement on Tuesday to denounce the authorities for having not urged the Japanese government to take the legal responsibility for the sexual slavery, according to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 The statement said that the "government" made public a settlement orientation in the wake of the report on the review of the "agreement" on the sexual slavery issue in 2015.
					
					 Saying that, as shown in the report, the "agreement" is unreasonable, it denounced the "government" for having not yet demanded the legal responsibility for the crime from the Japanese government.

articles.title: Investigation into Lee Myung Bak's Scandals Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Investigation into Lee Myung Bak's Scandals Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo, organizations in Pusan including the Pusan Regional Headquarters of People's Solidarity held a news conference before the Pusan District Prosecutor's Office on Jan. 9 in demand of the investigation into scandals of traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 Speakers said that it is necessary to investigate all crimes committed by Lee Myung Bak, Park Geun Hye and the "Liberal Korea Party" to the end and punish them.
					
					 A press release was read out there.
					
					 The release urged the prosecution to divest Lee Myung Bak of his privilege as former "president", arrest him at once and start the investigation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website the gist of respected Supreme Leader 
					Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It also stresses that the cause of the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is invincible.

articles.title: December Holidays of DPRK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
December Holidays of DPRK Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to celebrate the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the sixth anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership and the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Celebration meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Switzerland, Bulgaria, China, Nigeria, Benin, South Africa and Angola.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos showing the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee said:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il provided a strong foundation for building a powerful socialist country with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 Under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un the Korean army and people could achieve astonishing successes in bolstering up the defence capability and peace and security on the Korean Peninsula could be reliably defended.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Suk is the most faithful comrade-in-arms and comrade of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, a woman commander of Mt Paektu who safeguarded him at the risk of her life and mother of the revolution who brought up Generalissimo Kim Jong Il as the great successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Speakers at the events held in Nigeria and Benin praised the exploits of Kim Jong Il who demonstrated the might of the DPRK to the whole world with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The chairman of the Mfumalanga Provincial Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of South Africa said that the single-minded unity in the DPRK where the leader and the people are united as one cannot be found in anywhere of the world.
					
					 Several personages of Angola stressed that only victory and glory would be in store for the Korean people dynamically advancing toward the final victory, closely united around their leader.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Switzerland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Noble Career Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Noble Career Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign bodies posted on their websites articles marking the centenary of birth of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk between December 21 and 24 last year.
					 The websites carried photos and pictures of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk and art pieces depicting her image.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics and the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on their websites articles praising the noble revolutionary career of Kim Jong Suk, an outstanding woman political activist who left clear mark in the history of modern Korea by making a distinguished contribution to the liberation of the country and the building of a new country.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association posted an article saying that Kim Jong Suk was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family and the International Friendship Initiative "Explore DPRK" of Poland an article dealing with her undying feats.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article telling about the military exploits of Kim Jong Suk who delivered wholesale death to the enemy in battles during the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article lauding the feats of Kim Jong Suk, noting that her career was a brilliant one of a revolutionary who devoted her all to supporting the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Backed in Russia, Ukraine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Backed in Russia, Ukraine
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Russian and Ukrainian bodies on Jan. 2 and 3 made public statements in support of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in a statement that last year was a significant one when the DPRK demonstrated its prestige as a powerful country of Juche to the world. It went on:
					
					 The power of socialist Korea struck terror into the hearts of the enemies.
					
					 The world progressive peoples are convinced that the victory of the DPRK, a power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, will last forever.
					
					 We hope that the DPRK will further display its dignity as a power of Juche to be admired by the world by carrying out the militant tasks set forth by respected Comrade Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 The Dnepropetrovsk Branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a statement:
					
					 The reality of the DPRK tells that only when applying the Juche idea in a thoroughgoing way, can socialism emerge victorious without fail.
					
					 The imperialists should acknowledge the DPRK as a responsible nuclear power.
					
					 We extend full support to the Korean people in their struggle to reunify the country, build a powerful socialist nation and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 We sincerely hope that the Korean people will greet the 70th founding anniversary of the DPRK with bigger successes.

articles.title: Independencia es justicia y victoria, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Independencia es justicia y victoria, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Ninguna fuerza podra frenar a los pueblos del mundo que avanzan con pasos firmes por el camino de independencia tomando el control de su destino, aunque los imperialistas estan desesperados para bloquear esa marcha.
					 La independencia implica la justicia y victoria. 
					
					Si luchan con la firme conviccion y el correcto metodo, triunfaran sin falta.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					 Es importante mantener la independencia en la politica, lograr la autarquia en la economia y fortalecer el poderio de autodefensa nacional.
					
					  Los paises aspirantes a la independencia deben luchar unidos por hacer valer la justicia internacional.
					
					  Un nuevo mundo independiente sera posible cuando ellos logren la unidad.
					
					  Lo que temen mas los imperialistas esta en que los pueblos del mundo avancen por el camino de independencia uniendose y solidarizandose firmemente.
					
					  Si los pueblos del mundo luchan bajo la bandera de independencia y justicia, podran verificar la independencia en el mundo entero frustrando cualquier acto agresivo de los imperialistas y su estrategia de garrote.
					
					  La humanidad progresista del mundo debe luchar con energia contra el imperialismo y el dominacionismo con la conviccion de que la independencia es la justicia y victoria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena conducta de EE.UU. en contrasentido a la distension
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena conducta de EE.UU. en contrasentido a la distension
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el circulo militar norteamericano publico el despliegue en la Peninsula Coreana de los portaaviones nucleares Ronald Reagan actualmente en Japon y Carl Vinson en el territorio norteamericano y seguidamente, anuncio que despachara pronto a la zona del Pacifico oeste el otro Stennis.
					Por otra parte, EE.UU. emplazo en sus bases aereas en el Sur de Corea y Japon mas cazas de diversos tipos y efectivos trasladados de su territorio nacional.
					
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este sabado un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Ese imperdonable acto de provocacion militar envenena la atmosfera de mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, preparada gracias a la propuesta y esfuerzos protagonicos de la RPDC, y desafia al deseo y demandas de toda la nacion coreana sobre la distension y la paz en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Las fuerzas agresoras norteamericanas concentradas en la Peninsula Coreana y sus alrededores seran buen blanco de caza para los artilleros Hwasong del Ejercito Popular de Corea que mantienen al alcance de ataque la isla Guam y hasta el territorio principal de EE.UU.
					
					Seria mejor que EE.UU. abandone su ambicion irrealizable al ver bien la posicion estrategica de la RPDC y su estatus real como potencia militar de talla mundial. 
					
					Los belicistas yanquis deben actuar con prudencia pensando seriamente en las consecuencias catastroficas de sus provocaciones militares contra la RPDC que cuenta con el poderoso disuasivo de guerra.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun evalua la nueva orientacion sobre la mejora de relaciones N-S
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun evalua la nueva orientacion sobre la mejora de relaciones N-S
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un presento en su Mensaje del Ano Nuevo la nueva orientacion sobre el mejoramiento de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					Adelanta el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado este sabado y continua:
					
					Ella encarna la autoctona linea de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre la reunificacion de la patria y manifiesta la noble voluntad patriotica del Maximo Dirigente de escribir una nueva historia de la misma materia con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, refleja con exactitud el poderio estatal de la RPDC que ha crecido considerablemente, la estructura estrategica de la Peninsula Coreana cambiada por el, la situacion actual y la creciente aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion.
					
					Aliviar la aguda tension militar entre ambas partes coreanas y preparar antes que nada el ambiente pacifico de la Peninsula Coreana, crear las condiciones propicias a la reconciliacion nacional y la reunificacion, hacer a las autoridades de ambas partes levantar en alto la bandera de independencia nacional y otros problemas planteados constituyen la guia a ser mantenida en la actualidad para relajar la tension y mejorar los vinculos intercoreanos. 
					
					Las conversaciones de alto nivel Norte-Sur, recien efectuadas segun la nueva orientacion de la RPDC, comprobaron de nuevo que si el Norte y el Sur de Corea unen sus fuerzas, no tendran ningun problema insoluble. 
					
					Ahora es el momento de que ambas partes coreanas discutan con sinceridad el problema de la mejora de relaciones bilaterales y buscar con audacia la salida de la nacion  
					
					Ese problema no es el que interesa solo a las autoridades sino debe ser resuelto con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion. 
					
					Abriremos la puerta de conversaciones, contactos y viajes a todos los que desean con sinceridad la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion, incluidos el partido gubernamental y los opositores, las organizaciones de distintos sectores y las personalidades individuales.

articles.title: ACNC comenta movimiento militar de EE.UU. en contra de la distension
articles.content:
ACNC comenta movimiento militar de EE.UU. en contra de la distension
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- EE.UU. se mueve para introducir enormes fuerzas navales y aereas en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					 El dia 5, publico el despliegue en la Peninsula Coreana de los portaaviones nucleares Ronald Reagan actualmente en Japon y Carl Vinson en el territorio norteamericano y seguidamente, anuncio que despachara pronto a la zona del Pacifico oeste el otro Stennis.
					
					 Por otra parte, cambio hacia la zona cercana de la Peninsula Coreana la inicial ruta de navegacion de 3 flotillas de portahelicopteros Wasp, Bonhom Richard y America capaces de desembarcar en el tiempo de emergencia una division de infantes de marina en el territorio de la RPDC.
					
					  Segun trascendidos, en 7 bases aereas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea y Japon se concentra gran cantidad de aviones de combate y efectivos trasladados desde el territorio principal de EE.UU.
					
					  Esto es una conducta aviesa encaminada a congelar al clima de mejoramiento de relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea y llevar al fracaso los eventos de la nacion coreana. Tambien resulta un desafio a la unanime aspiracion y demanda de los nacionales y extranjeros sobre el alivio de tension y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Hasta ahora, cada vez que se realizaban los dialogos y contactos entre ambas partes coreanas y se veian los indicios de mejoramiento de relaciones bilaterales, EE.UU. hizo todo lo posible para estropearlos.
					
					  Cuando toda Corea estaba llena del afan por la reunificacion con motivo de publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, EE.UU. instigo a las autoridades surcoreanas a "crear dos Coreas". Tambien es EE.UU. el que puso obstaculos cuando se mejoraban las relaciones intercoreanas despues de publicadas la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					  Tanto ayer como hoy, no se cambia la voluntad de EE.UU. de oponerse a la reunificacion de Corea.
					
					  Esta vez tambien, EE.UU. dice que apoya el dialogo intercoreano, pero en realidad, intenta impedir la mejora de relaciones N-S introduciendo en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno sus enormes fuerzas armadas agresivas.
					
					  Los medios de prensa y los especialistas del Sur de Corea evaluan que si se toma en cuenta la velocidad de navegacion de Carl Vinson, este portaaviones llegara a la Peninsula Coreana a finales de enero o a principios de febrero, o sea, en visperas de la apertura de Juegos Olimpicos Invernales de Phyongchang. Agregan que si se suma hasta Ronald Reagan ubicado actualmente en Japon, se concentraran de una vez 3 portaaviones nucleares en los alrededores de la Peninsula Coreana, lo cual deviene hecho muy excepcional.
					
					  Las fuerzas armadas de EE.UU., que se concentran cerca de la Peninsula Coreana, seran buenos blancos de caza para los artilleros "Hwasong" del Ejercito Popular de Corea que mantienen a su alcance de fuego la isla Guam y hasta el territorio principal de EE.UU.
					
					  Al ver correctamente la naturaleza agresiva de EE.UU., todos los coreanos deberan luchar tenazmente contra el aumento de fuerzas armadas del imperio y su intento de desatar la guerra de agresion anti-Norte.
